posts.name: Blue Moon Cafe
posts.note: Popular cafe serving American breakfast meals in a bright, funky setting, open 24 hours on weekends. The dish to get from what I'm told is the Captain Crunch French Toast with homemade whipcream and fresh seasonal berries.

posts.name: Chaps Pit Beef
posts.note: Popular pit-beef outlet serving namesake sandwiches and homestyle sides in a strip-club parking lot.

posts.name: Golden West Cafe
posts.note: Funky Hampden roadhouse offering New Mexican dishes and eclectic comfort grub in unpretentious digs.

posts.name: One-Eyed Mike's
posts.note: Local gastropub in a historic former tavern with a hand-carved bar, tin ceiling and courtyard.
